LON.description: longitude, check/ask two conventions in imma1 doc

VI.description: visibility indic. ICOADS.C0.VI not found in new set

SI.description: SST measurement method, table not like original, nor like in doc

BSI.description: box system indicator. Currently not in use

TR.description: duration of period of reference for amount of precipitation

QI1.description: QC indicator for height of clouds

QI10.description: QC indicator for sea surface temperature

QI11.description: QC indicator for period of wind waves of of measured waves

QI12.description: QC indicator for height of wind waves of of measured waves

QI15.description: QC indicator for characteristic of pressure tendency

QI16.description: QC indicator for amount of pressure tendency

QI17.description: QC indicator for true direction of ship

QI18.description: QC indicator for ship's average speed

SLL.description: max height of cargo above summer load line

SLHH.description: departure of summer max load line from sea level

QI23.description: QC indicator for course over ground

QI24.description: QC indicator for speed over ground

QI28.description: QC indicator for relative wind direction

QI29.description: QC indicator for relative wind speed

OPCV.description: partial pressure of carbon dioxide value

OPCZ.description: partial pressure of carbon dioxide depth

frame_number.description: The number found at the top of the microfilm frame where the voyage begins. The frame number was kept until the voyage is complete, even if the voyage covered several sequential frames.

hour.description: Hours of ship position, converted to 24-hour clock (00-23)

lat_deg_an.description: latitude by account at noon, degrees

lat_min_an.description: latitude by account at noon, minutes

lat_hemis_an.description: latitude by account at noon, hemisphere

lon_deg_an.description: longitude by account at noon, degrees

lon_min_an.description: longitude by account at noon, minutes

lon_hemis_an.description: longitude by account at noon, hemisphere

current_dir.description: Direction towards which the currents are moving. Given in a variety of formats: NEW, WNE, C (calm), V (variable), or B (baffling), mix between number and directions (N45E) also adding a by (as X) and to (as T).

current_speed_ind.description: Units in which speed is measured.

current_speed.description: Given in fraction or in narrative terms. For narrative terms (values from 40-58) look at key table

min_drift_coord.description: Minutes of latitude or longitude of current drift over a given time period.

period_drift.description: Time period (in hours 24hrs format) over which the amount of current drift in minutes was calculated. e.g 1hr code as 01

baro_pressure_one.description: Barometric pressure (first entry). First two characters are either inches or millimeters, last two characters correspond to hundredths of inch or tenths of mm

attached_thermometer_one.description: Attached thermometer (first entry). Position is blank for whole degrees, and quarter degrees are rounded to the nearest tenths of a degree.

attached_thermometer_two.description: Attached thermometer (second entry). Position is blank for whole degrees, and quarter degrees are rounded to the nearest tenths of a degree.

attached_thermometer_three.description: Attached thermometer (third entry). Position is blank for whole degrees, and quarter degrees are rounded to the nearest tenths of a degree.

hour_air_temp_one.description: Hour in 24hrs format of first air temperature entry

air_temperature_one.description: Air temperature (first entry), units according to temperature indicator

sea_surface_temperature_one.description: Sea surface temperature (first entry), units according to temperature indicator

sea_depth_temperature.description: Sea temperature at depth (first entry), units according to temperature indicator

hour_air_temp_two.description: Hour in 24hrs format of second air temperature entry

air_temperature_two.description: Air temperature (second entry), units according to temperature indicator

sea_surface_temperature_two.description: Sea surface temperature (second entry), units according to temperature indicator

hour_air_temp_three.description: Hour in 24hrs format of third air temperature entry

air_temperature_three.description: Air temperature (third entry), units according to temperature indicator

sea_surface_temperature_three.description: Sea surface temperature (third entry), units according to temperature indicator

wind_dir_start.description: Wind direction. Given in a variety of formats: NEW, WNE, C (calm), V (variable), or B (baffling), mix between number and directions (N45E) also adding a by (as X) and to (as T).

wind_force_start.description: Wind force (part one or only entry), Beaufort Wind scale (0-12) unless the observation was in a descriptive form (20-73).

wind_info_start.description: Additional wind force information when available.

wind_dir_middle.description: Wind direction (middle part). Given in a variety of formats: NEW, WNE, C (calm), V (variable), or B (baffling), mix between number and directions (N45E) also adding a by (as X) and to (as T).

wind_force_middle.description: Wind force (middle part), Beaufort Wind scale (0-12) unless the observation was in a descriptive form (20-73).

wind_info_middle.description: Additional wind force information when available.

wind_dir_later.description: Wind direction (later part). Given in a variety of formats: NEW, WNE, C (calm), V (variable), or B (baffling), mix between number and directions (N45E) also adding a by (as X) and to (as T).

wind_force_later.description: Wind force (later part), Beaufort Wind scale (0-12) unless the observation was in a descriptive form (20-73).

wind_info_later.description: Additional wind force information when available.

cloud_one.description: Forms of clouds by code (first entry).

cloud_dir_one.description: Clouds direction (first entry). Given in a variety of formats: NEW, WNE, C (calm), V (variable), or B (baffling), mix between number and directions (N45E) also adding a by (as X) and to (as T).

cloud_two.description: Forms of clouds by code (second entry).

cloud_dir_two.description: Clouds direction (second entry). Given in a variety of formats: NEW, WNE, C (calm), V (variable), or B (baffling), mix between number and directions (N45E) also adding a by (as X) and to (as T).

cloud_three.description: Forms of clouds by code (third entry).

cloud_dir_three.description: Clouds direction (third entry). Given in a variety of formats: NEW, WNE, C (calm), V (variable), or B (baffling), mix between number and directions (N45E) also adding a by (as X) and to (as T).

hour_of_weather.description: Whole hours with any fraction rounded to the nearest hour.

weather.description: Present weather. Refer to weather indicator

qc_magnetic_var.description: Magnetic variation queality control indicator. MV means that the magnetic variation (mag_var) failed the minimum quality control at the time of the digitization of the report.

commander.description: Commander as appeared in Journal, left justified

from_city.description: Departure port as it appears on the form

to_city.description: Destination port as it appears on the form
